original_title: Sammy Hagar: The Long Road to Cabo
overview: The second of three eccentric Van Halen front men, Sammy Hagar may be best known for his strong voice and penchant for good tequila. Hagar is also a fan of Cabo San Lucas (where he owns a bar) and named his band, The Waboritas, after his favorite locale. Includes rare live footage of Hagar's notorious co-headlining tour with his Van Halen predecessor, David Lee Roth, plus a peek backstage during the tour. Note: Contains explicit lyrics.
title: Sammy Hagar: The Long Road to Cabo
